summary: Git ignore rules for build output, tooling artifacts, and local files.
Scheduled GitHub Actions workflow that runs the activity aggregation script and commits updated activity JSON.
GitHub Pages deployment workflow using the official Astro action and Node 20.
Alternate GitHub Pages workflow that builds the Astro site and uploads the `dist` artifact.
Prettier formatting rules for consistent code style.
Astro configuration including site URL, integrations (React, MDX, Tailwind, Pagefind, sitemap), and a custom sitemap fix.
ESLint configuration enabling Astro, React, and TypeScript linting.
Project manifest with scripts, dependencies, and tooling configuration.
npm lockfile pinning dependency versions for reproducible installs.
PostCSS configuration for Tailwind and autoprefixer.
Tailwind theme extensions and content paths; maps CSS variables to tokens.
TypeScript configuration and path aliases for Astro/TS builds.
Disables Jekyll processing on GitHub Pages.
Custom domain declaration for GitHub Pages.
Human-readable site metadata/credits.
Robots directives and sitemap location for crawlers.
Aggregated activity feed data generated by the `aggregate` script.
Fetches and normalizes activity feeds into the public activity JSON.
Configuration for external feeds consumed by the aggregation script.
Type declarations for Astro environment.
Primary site layout with header/nav, footer, theme bootstrap, and main container.
Root landing page (coming soon) with minimal layout and email CTA.
Full homepage with hero, Now card, and latest writing list.
Personal OS page composed of many bespoke visual components.
Now page that renders a snapshot via `NowCard`.
Resume page with confidential/public modes, data-driven sections, and download actions.
JSON endpoint exposing resume data.
Writing index listing MDX posts and metadata.
Dynamic writing detail page that renders MDX content.
SEO meta + JSON-LD helper used across pages.
Pagefind search UI wrapper and query sync script.

Command-palette modal with ticker and navigation commands.
Renders “Now” content from JSON data.

Table layout for process/status readouts.
Sparkline chart primitive.

Toggle row used for settings/status panels.

Dock-style list of apps in the Personal OS page.
Static preview of the Personal OS console.
Quadrant map visualization for exploration themes.
Radial wheel showing recovery and cycling progress.
Process monitor list with CPU load indicator.
Settings grid for Personal OS controls and toggles.
Signal rack for gauges and chip indicators.
Hero visualization showing system fields/clusters.
Spec sheet card for Personal OS stats.
Orbit diagram visualizing world categories.
CTA dock for resume with contact and bio.
Grid of case study cards.
Toggle for confidential/public resume views.
Card for a single resume experience entry.
Timeline of experience entries with nested cards.
Resume hero/header section with metrics and contact area.
Impact summary list for resume page.
Filterable keyword chip list for resume focus areas.
Scoreboard display of resume metrics.
Snapshot cards for resume highlights.
Sticky contact panel for resume layout.
Astro content collection schemas for writing, projects, and press.
Now page content (location, focus, reading, notes).
Primary resume data used by the resume page.

Writing post MDX content.
Writing post MDX content.
Config data for the About/Personal OS page modules.
Command palette entries and sections for the OS console.

Snapshot metrics used in the OS console status card.
Personal OS data powering About page components.
Category metadata for place-related visualizations.
Structured resume data (duplicated for runtime access).
Typed helper exports for resume data and utilities.
Statistics data for visual modules.
Worlds data for orbit visualizations.
Activity data normalization helpers.
Lenis smooth-scroll setup script loaded by the AppShell.
Utility classes for grain, radial/conic backgrounds, and text reveal effects.

Font imports and typographic defaults.
